metadata.name: Cow (JLT Collectible)
metadata.description:
The cow is a symbol of patience, nourishment, female power, beginnings and calmness – and one of many animal representatives and symbols in the JLT universe.

This JLT COLLECTIBLE can be used as a playable character in Lund’s forthcoming game, IN SEARCH OF IDEAS. It comes with 20 JLTs, which entitle the holder to join the JLT board as a shareholder and participate in decisions around Lund’s artistic practice and life.

The JONAS LUND TOKEN (JLT) was launched in 2018 and is a distributed, decentralised, autonomous artistic practice. It aims to optimise and streamline decision-making in art production and around strategic decisions relating to Jonas Lund's career path.

Verisart Certified: https://verisart.com/works/c5d47633-3d41-4e1b-8e4e-57cfd4abe50d
